reviews.text:
The softest melt in your mouth veal cheek I‚Äôve ever had. I don‚Äôt know what sorcery & love is behind this dish, but I‚Äôve never had veal this soft!! I wish I had a second stomach to fill it up with the divine dishes here! Every meal is cooked with love and is mouth watering. The house wine (Nebbiolo) complements the meal ideally. Very nice traditional atmosphere!

This is now one of my favorite places in all of Italy!

Could not recommend this place more!! Great staff, chef is very talented and passionate. We loved the veal cheek, gnocchi, antipasto entree and desserts. 10/10 would go back!! Thank you for an amazing evening. üôåüèº

Excellent food, staff was very nice and helpful. Best panacotta we have ever had. Chef/owner came out and checked on everyone in the restaurant and brought tastings of their specialties. Would come back if ever here again.

Best meal in Turin so far!
Following a French blog¬†¬ªs review, I decided to book two dinners at Osteria Antiche Sere. After two so-so dinners I was at the Osteria tonight.
And it was definitely worth the long walk from the Centro storico!
Food was great (antipasto misto and agnolotti), the cheese plate was absolutely incredible ‚Ä¶ loved it!
Add on top a friendly staff and it‚Äôs a perfect hit! Thanks so much for this wonderful dinner! Can‚Äôt wait to be back in 3 days!

Excellent authentic small Italian restaurant. The food is some of the best northern Italian cuisine I have tried. The staff are very friendly and helpful. They were extremely hospitable. Make sure you call to make a reservation in advance because they book up.
